system.description:
You have made contact with something in the deep parts of the world, whether literal or metaphorical and it has changed you and your connection to nature. You gain the following benefits:

  • Your Wisdom score increases by 1, to a maximum of 20.
  • You may change your warlock spellcasting ability to Wisdom if you desire. Once made, this choice is permanent.

  • Your warlock levels count as druid levels for the purpose of your @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-class-features.Item.3jdfihvtbyhbv9ez]{Wild Shape} feature. Additionally, choose a creature type from the following list: aberration, celestial, fey, monstrosity, or undead. You may select creatures of the chosen type as wild shape options, but when wild shaping into one of them, you must spend warlock spell points equal to its CR. If the wild shape form has spellcasting, you can only use the spells from it where you can cast a spell of that level or higher as a druid or warlock. For example, if you are a level 4 druid/level 4 warlock with this feat and wild shape into a sea hag, you can cast the sea hag form's dancing lights and disguise self spells, but not geas, scrying, or weather control. If you were a level 16 druid/level 4 warlock, however, you could use all of those spells. Shifting out of a form and then back into it does not reset daily uses of a spell granted by that form. If you are using warlock to determine your maximum spellcasting level, you only gain access to spells of 6th level from your wild shape forms if you have 6th arcanum, 7th level if you have 7th arcanum, and so forth.

  • You gain the following additional warlock expanded spell list in addition to any you already possess:

    Darkwood

    1st@UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-spells.Item.o94b50tj959v55mm]{Bane}, @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-spells.Item.cvrja4dkrr0zoerp]{Entangle}
    2nd@UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-spells.Item.6q34ttse78toj5x0]{Blindness/Deafness}, @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-spells.Item.oqsv50k3glkbk7z2]{Find Steed}
    3rd@UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-spells.Item.bfkoxk0m52fhckqi]{Cobra's Spit}, @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-spells.Item.xe7t43c42bkhxihe]{Conjure Animals}
    4th@UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-spells.Item.67ex7mn5kkutvnqn]{Black Tentacles}, @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-spells.Item.2q65v0xklhfx73to]{Blight}
    5th@UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-spells.Item.vms65nmhqqgu9b2w]{Contagion}, @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-spells.Item.spngrj7xkq5ih8yo]{Insect Plague}
system.prerequisite: 3 levels in druid, 3 levels in warlock
